name: World War 2: WW2 FPS Shooting
description:
There are many maps here. Some Desert factories, and cities Fighting against the different enemy armies. you can play multiplayer and single-player With a variety of Weapons. fulfill your military tasks or missions by Choosing the best strategies. You are the best commando from your badge.You have the best shooting skills so go and defeat the rascal enemies. Compete with the military of different countries and prove yourself as the best military. By using the different military vehicles and things change the look of your warrior's skins, improve your health, damage, speed, and so on. The World war 2 game is the deadliest. In the battlefield, you can use the machine gun & snipers
Features::
-endless battle
-amazing world war detailed environment
-customization of soldiers
-various types of weapons
-sound of gunfire during the blitz
-Various types of the hand grenade
